channel.title: My Other-Person Commands D/C'ing Me

item.title: My Other-Person Commands D/C'ing Me
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You’re getting an arrayIndexOutOfBoundsException or nullPointerException.
Read up on exceptions and how to prevent/catch them.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial

Read full topic

item.title: My Other-Person Commands D/C'ing Me
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Okay, here’s my problem:
I am trying to make commands that effect other people… Ex.: ::gfxother 008 PlayerName

Where gfxother is the command, 008 is the # of GFX i want to happen to them, and PlayerName is their name.

Why does this command, and all the other ‘other-person’ commands i make D/C me and not work?

Here’s the command: if(command.startsWith("gfxother") && playerRights >= 1) { int gfxother = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9,12)); String nam = command.substring(13); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.stillgfx(gfxother, absX, absY); }

Read full topic
